title: Nautilus from League of Legends

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Dredge Line: Target a player. Skip their next turn. (1 Mana)
- Titan's Wrath: Gain 2 Shield, whenever you have to draw cards, you lose as much Shield as you can before drawing cards. (2 Mana)
- Riptide: The player in front of you and before you draw a card. (3 Mana)
- Depth Charge: Target player's next turn is skipped and they draw 4 cards. (8 Mana)

desc:
Post 279
- When played, this goes in your identity zone.
- When you are forced to draw cards, you gain Mana per cards drawn. Mana can be spent to cast abilities.
- You do not gain Mana from Shields.
